text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I head towards the train station on<n>my day off, I
suddenly hear a familiar<n>voice.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: All right, time to put my super-duper<n>secret plan into action!
choice_data_list: Oh? And what would that be?
Oh? And what would that be?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Well, you see... Wait! What are you<n>doing here?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Oh, yeah? Me too! Ah, but this is all a<n>part of my
super-duper secret plan, so<n>that's all I'm telling you!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Aaanyway, I better get going! See you<n>later!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara dashes away before I can<n>say another word. A
mix of curiosity<n>and concern compels me to follow<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hm... That magazine said it should be<n>around here...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she wanders around aimlessly,<n>one of the nearby
shopkeepers<n>approaches her.

text_block_list.name: Shady Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: Lookin' for somethin' special, are<n>we?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yup! I'm trying to find the shoe store<n>around here! Do you
know where it<n>is?

text_block_list.name: Shady Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text:
Forget about that store! I've got just<n>the shoes for you,
riiight here.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
No, thank you! I'm not looking for<n>just any shoes. I need
the kind that<n>give you super speed!

text_block_list.name: Shady Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text:
Well, what a co-inky-dink! These just<n>so happen to be the
world-renowned<n>Super Speed Sneakers! How about I<n>give
you a deal on them?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Urgh... I have juuust enough to buy<n>them, but... Are you
SURE they'll make<n>me faster?

text_block_list.name: Shady Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text:
Positive! First place is as good as<n>yours with these babies
on your feet!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Really truly?! Well... they are a bit<n>expensive, but if they'll
make me<n>faster—

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
What?! All that stuff about making me<n>faster was a lie?! But
he said first<n>place was as good as mine!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
No kidding... And now my super-duper<n>secret plan to get
faster is down the<n>drain!
choice_data_list: How were you going to do that?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: With shoes that make me extra fast,<n>of course!
choice_data_list: Only practice can increase your speed.
Only practice can increase your speed.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm not trying to skip out on any<n>training... I just want to
get faster!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Remember those nice things the<n>reporter said about you?
That made<n>me really happy.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
If that's the kind of stuff she says<n>NOW, imagine what
people would say<n>about you if I WON!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I figured if I could find a way to win<n>first place faster, I could
surprise you<n>and everyone else!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I'd love to win a race, and if that<n>means everyone will
praise you, I'd<n>love it even more!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's already putting in the work, but<n>Haru Urara still wants
more. As a<n>trainer, I'm in awe of her dedication.
choice_data_list: Well, it's good to be motivated!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Right?! Ehehe, I'm glad you feel that<n>way. I'll make sure to
find the right<n>shoes—
choice_data_list: But we need to do this together.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Together?
choice_data_list: Let's find a way to win... together.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Yeah, you're right! I shoulda<n>gone to you right away!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Well, looks like I'll need to give<n>tomorrow's training some<n>
extra-special effort! See you then!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara excitedly runs back to<n>Tracen Academy. With a
better<n>understanding of her motivations, I<n>feel my desire to
help her win growing<n>even stronger.
